titleStmt.title: Nobiliss. Ampliss. Illustriss. dominis D. Gilberto Erroliæ comiti, D. Haio, magno stabuli magistro, &c. nec non D. Roberto D. Rossio, Barroni de Haket Melvin, &c. ... Julij an. Dom. 1648 horis & loco solitis pre̜side D. Nevaio honoris obsequii & observantiæ ergo, D.N.Q. ...
Theses. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Nevay, David.

notesStmt.note: Student's names in five columns beneath the title; theses listed in two columns beneath the student's names.
Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library.
